text: Ken Hitchcock (born December 17, 1951 in Edmonton, Alberta) is a former Canadian NHL ice hockey coach, who coached in the NHL from 1995–96 to 2018–19. Ken won one Stanley Cup with the Dallas Stars, in the 1998–99 NHL season. Category:1951 births Category:Ice hockey people from Alberta Category:Jack Adams Award winners Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Edmonton
title: Ken Hitchcock
